creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas
markings: Recto: ULC, in pencil [10], in black [6205]; LRC: [Rugby]; in black ink, below the title: [where the ---- falls dodged]; Verso: UL in pencil [RLLL]; LL: 'D' Douglas collector's mark; center, in black pencil [not used]; in blue pencil [#94]; stamped, violet ink [ART DEPARTMENT, THE CENTURY CO., UNION SQUARE, NEW YORK CITY]; seems to have been mounted on a sheet of heavier paper, scraps of which remain long the outer edges of the verso.
medium: Pen and black ink on Bristol board
title: The Clock Tower Rugby, Initial T.
